data: {"concept_id": "identity", "concept_name": "Character Identity", "type": "element", "definition": "The story a character tells about who they are—roles, loyalties, values, and lines they won’t cross—tested under pressure.", "scope_notes": "Identity is enacted, defended, negotiated, or fractured. Track self-claim vs witnessed behavior. Dials from low→medium→high salience.", "axes": "mode|salience", "axis_values": "enact|defend|negotiate|fracture | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "drive|decision_style|backstory|voice|change|theme", "conflicts_with": "mask_only|resetting_labels|plot_puppetry|flat_claims", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_identity_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_identity_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_enact", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "enact", "description": "Behavior proves a claimed identity (choosing loyalty, honoring a code, paying a cost).", "detection_hint": "Look for choices that align with stated values when inconvenient.", "false_positive_risks": "Virtue-signaling with no cost carried.", "minimal_example": "She returns the cash and names the cashier who skimmed it.", "counterexample": "She posts a slogan and changes nothing.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_defend", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "defend", "description": "Pushback or boundary to preserve identity when it’s threatened.", "detection_hint": "No/Not-this lines; refusals; taking heat to keep the self-image intact.", "false_positive_risks": "Sulky posture that changes nothing.", "minimal_example": "‘I don’t rat.’ He eats the suspension.", "counterexample": "A speech no one believes, followed by cave-in.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_negotiate", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "negotiate", "description": "Identity is bargained or hybridized to meet conflicting roles.", "detection_hint": "Compromises, redefinitions, double-lives, code-switching with stakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Random flip-flopping unlinked to pressure.", "minimal_example": "She wears the badge at work and the hoodie at home, choosing language with care.", "counterexample": "Jokes in one scene, solemn in the next, for no reason.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_fracture", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "fracture", "description": "Break in the story of self: betrayal of value, forced admission, or reinvention.", "detection_hint": "Public contradiction, confession, renunciation; no going back.", "false_positive_risks": "Shock scene with instant reset.", "minimal_example": "He signs the confession that names his brother.", "counterexample": "He ‘betrays’ then the family dinner is normal tomorrow.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_salience_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Identity hums in the background: casual markers, private labels, low-cost alignment.", "detection_hint": "Small choices, quiet rituals; little public stake.", "false_positive_risks": "Atmosphere without link to behavior.", "minimal_example": "He nods at the team crest and straightens it before the game.", "counterexample": "Logo parade with zero choices affected.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_salience_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Identity shapes choices and relationships; visible to others.", "detection_hint": "Taking sides, declining opportunities, code-based decisions.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy activity without consequences.", "minimal_example": "She turns down an easy win because it breaks the code.", "counterexample": "She claims values but cashes the check anyway.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "signal_id": "sig_salience_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Identity becomes the battleground; public, costly, irreversible.", "detection_hint": "Renunciation, oath-taking, outing, whistleblowing; names change.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle with full reset.", "minimal_example": "He drops the family name on record and files papers.", "counterexample": "PR stunt that fades next scene.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "misconception_id": "mask_only", "description": "Treating persona/costume as identity without choices that prove it.", "tells": "Cosplay of values.", "likely_causes": "Confusing brand with being.", "corrective_feedback": "Pair markers with paid costs or sacrifices.", "micro_drill": "Add one choice that hurts but aligns with claimed value.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "misconception_id": "resetting_labels", "description": "Self-labels change every scene with no cause or consequence.", "tells": "Whiplash claims.", "likely_causes": "Chasing novelty.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie label shifts to stakes, revelation, or loss; show fallout.", "micro_drill": "Map three scenes: claim→test→shift with cost.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "misconception_id": "plot_puppetry", "description": "Identity flips to serve the outline, not pressure or truth.", "tells": "OOC ‘betrayal’ for twist.", "likely_causes": "Forgetting pre-signals.", "corrective_feedback": "Seed contradictions; let fracture pay a price.", "micro_drill": "Insert an earlier crack + carry the cost forward.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"concept_id": "identity", "misconception_id": "flat_claims", "description": "Identity only told in bios or introductions; no in-scene enactment.", "tells": "Static ‘I am’ statements.", "likely_causes": "Bio writing instead of story.", "corrective_feedback": "Force enact/defend/negotiation moments with consequences.", "micro_drill": "Replace two bio lines with one choice and one boundary.", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_identity_identify_mode_salience", "concept_id": "identity", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by Identity Mode (enact/defend/negotiate/fracture) and Salience (low/medium/high). Justify with one concrete cue.", "expected_features": "Correct mode+salience; cites signal; ties to cost/publicness/contradiction.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with sharp evidence and clear cost/publicness", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels off; evidence vague"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include brand-without-choice and spectacle-with-reset traps.", "hint_steps": "1) What choice proves it? 2) Who saw? 3) What changed?", "variation_axes": "mode|salience", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_identity_negotiate_roles", "concept_id": "identity", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Given two conflicting roles, rewrite the moment to negotiate identity without collapsing either role (code-switch, boundary, hybrid).", "expected_features": "Keeps both roles legible; adds cost or delay; language shifts appropriately.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Hybrid/boundary reads inevitable and costly", "Meets": "Reasonable compromise with some cost", "Developing": "Hand-wave; no cost"}, "distractor_strategy": "Easy compromise without stakes.", "hint_steps": "1) Name the roles 2) Choose cost 3) Adjust language/behavior", "variation_axes": "roles|language|cost", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_identity_trigger_fracture", "concept_id": "identity", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Take a flat-claims character and craft a fracture moment that forces a real choice on identity.", "expected_features": "Irreversible choice; public consequence; previous signals seeded.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Fracture lands with consequence and echoes prior cracks", "Meets": "Fracture clear; some consequence", "Developing": "Shock-only with reset"}, "distractor_strategy": "Twist for twist’s sake.", "hint_steps": "1) Seed crack 2) Choose public stake 3) Close the exit", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|foreshadow", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_identity_symbol_line", "concept_id": "identity", "cognitive_goal": "compose", "task_type": "generate", "prompt_template": "Write one line that symbolically enacts identity (object/gesture/wording) without naming it.", "expected_features": "Detail ties to value; pays off later; reads inevitable in context.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Symbol feels earned and re-usable", "Meets": "Specific and suggestive", "Developing": "Novelty with no tie"}, "distractor_strategy": "Cool-but-empty tokens.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick value 2) Choose physical sign 3) Place in action", "variation_axes": "symbol|value|action", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_1", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "enact|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He hands the wallet to the clerk and waits for the manager, knowing he’ll miss the train.", "context_tags": "honesty|cost", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_2", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "defend|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "“I don’t beg.” She closes the email draft and pays the fee.", "context_tags": "pride|boundary", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_3", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "negotiate|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He switches language mid-call and lets the supervisor think it was their idea.", "context_tags": "code_switch|survival", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_4", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "fracture|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She deletes the family name from the form and signs twice.", "context_tags": "reinvention|public", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_weak_1", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He lists five adjectives in his bio and acts the same in every scene.", "context_tags": "flat_claims", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_identity_weak_2", "concept_id": "identity", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He ‘betrays’ his code, but next chapter nothing remembers it.", "context_tags": "resetting_labels", "source_file": "Character Identity.md", "source_md5": "f5e97964370a27c4c9cac2cd986fbcf3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:34:03.468093Z"}
